ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Definitely, overall an outstanding language course.

I would recommend this class overall to anyone. I would tell them that it is quite demanding and will require a lot of work. I would tell someone that if they really want to read and write Arabic well, that they should take this course.

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: This course has reinforced my knowledge of grammar and expanded my knowledge of vocabulary.

This course is helping me to prepare for practicing public health in an international, Arabic-speaking setting. This course is strengthening my reading and writing abilities in MSA and improving my listening abilities for application in my future career.
